name: Atme - Prototype
description:
Tip | The game was made to be played on a phone, stay tuned to download the future apk.

The Game

ATME is a 2D vector tactile game where you should follow the rhythm of breathing in order to surpass the different levels.

Creative Statements
  • Minimalist game.
  • Simple and straightforward.
  • Relaxing.
  • No time limits.

If you like the idea that we try to carry out, please consider:

  • Star it & comment in the section below.
  • Follow us on Twitter.
    • Rpb022
    • Borja_Dev
  • Give us love <3
Install Instructions

The current version is only a prototype. It´s only for Windows x64. We hope having support in the future for Android and iOS too.

Develop by:

  • Rodrigo Perdices Bordonado as programmer & designer.
  • Borja Borrallo San Segundo as designer & art.
